name: Find the Dogchicken
description:
Combine everyday objects until you find a dogchicken.

Made for the Rusty Game Jam 2, written in Rust for the WASM-4 fantasy console. Supports web, desktop & even mobile!

Stuck? You can find a handy walkthrough here.

Controls:

  • Z: Select the first item to combine
  • X: Select the second item to combine
  • <>^v: Move the cursor around the list of items

Jam Details:

  • Theme: Image of a dogchicken
  • Modifier: Portable
